scope.purpose: Electrical safety regulations for Victoria under the Electricity Safety Act 1998
scope.application: All electrical installations, works, and operations in Victoria
scope.critical_for_solar: Legal framework governing solar installation, testing, inspection, and safety compliance in Victoria

structure.part_5: Electrical safety duties and safety standards (501-511)

objectives.purpose: Ensure electrical safety and reduce electrical incidents and deaths

australian_nz_wiring_rules.application: AS/NZS 3000 applies as referenced in these regulations

photovoltaic_array_testing.requirements: Specific testing requirements for PV arrays
photovoltaic_array_testing.compliance: Must comply with AS/NZS 5033 and other applicable standards

battery_system_testing.requirements: Testing requirements for battery energy storage systems

grid_connected_inverter_testing.requirements: Testing of grid-connected inverter energy systems

consumer_generation_systems.scope: Premises with consumer electricity generation systems (includes solar)

general_wiring.standard: Electrical installations must comply with AS/NZS 3000

pre_regulation_installations.compliance: Deemed to comply if met standards when installed

alternative_design.process: Alternative solutions must be assessed by registered professional engineer
alternative_design.safety_level: Must achieve equivalent or higher safety level than AS/NZS 3000

earthing_systems.requirements: Multiple earthing neutral (MEN) systems and specific earthing requirements
earthing_systems.solar_relevance: Critical for solar system earthing and safety

main_earthing_conductor.specifications: Size and installation requirements for main earthing conductor

general_testing_requirements.scope: Low voltage electrical installation work testing requirements

authorized_testing_personnel.who: Licensed electrical workers or registered electrical engineers
authorized_testing_personnel.competency: Must be competent for the type of testing being performed

mandatory_inspection_work.solar_inclusions: PV systems above specified thresholds require inspection

prescribed_work_inspection.certificates: Certificate of inspection required before energization

inspector_obligations.duties: Licensed electrical inspectors must follow specific procedures
inspector_obligations.independence: Cannot inspect own work or work they designed

safety_services.obligations: Suppliers must provide safety services to customers
safety_services.scope: Includes fault response and safety advice

service_line_safety.requirements: Service lines and directly connected installation safety
service_line_safety.supplier_responsibility: Supplier responsible for service line integrity

protective_equipment.installation: Suppliers must install appropriate protective equipment

serious_electrical_incidents.definition: Incidents causing death, serious injury, or major property damage
serious_electrical_incidents.reporting: Must be reported to ESV within 24 hours

other_electrical_incidents.scope: Accidental contact and electric shock incidents
other_electrical_incidents.reporting_threshold: Medical attention required or work capacity affected

fire_authority_reporting.coordination: Reporting requirements to fire control authorities

record_maintenance.duration: Records must be maintained for specified periods
record_maintenance.solar_records: Installation certificates, test results, inspection reports

high_voltage_standards.scope: Safety standards for high voltage electrical installations
high_voltage_standards.design: Must be designed by registered professional engineer

complex_electrical_installations.definition: Large or complex electrical installations requiring additional safety measures
complex_electrical_installations.solar_relevance: Large-scale solar installations may be classified as complex

patient_areas.scope: Additional safety standards for medical patient areas

energized_equipment_work.restrictions: Live work only permitted in specific circumstances
energized_equipment_work.safety_procedures: Strict safety procedures for energized work
energized_equipment_work.solar_application: Relevant for solar system maintenance and fault finding

protected_installations.interference: Prohibition on interfering with electrical installations

striking_objects.prevention: Duty to prevent objects striking overhead electrical infrastructure

australian_standards_integration.as_nzs_5033: PV arrays - referenced for solar installations
australian_standards_integration.as_nzs_4777: Grid connection of energy systems via inverters

licensing_requirements.electrical_workers: Must hold appropriate electrical worker licence
licensing_requirements.electrical_inspectors: Must be licensed electrical inspector for inspection work
licensing_requirements.engineers: Registered professional engineer for complex work and alternative designs

certification_system.certificate_of_inspection: Required for prescribed electrical work before energization

enforcement_penalties.serious_breaches: Penalties up to thousands of penalty units for serious safety breaches
enforcement_penalties.inspector_powers: ESV inspectors have powers of entry and investigation
enforcement_penalties.compliance_orders: ESV can issue notices requiring compliance action
enforcement_penalties.licence_sanctions: Licence suspension or cancellation for serious breaches

installation_requirements.design_standards: All solar installations must meet AS/NZS 5033 and AS/NZS 3000
installation_requirements.testing_mandatory: PV array and inverter testing per regulations 243-245
installation_requirements.inspection_thresholds: Large systems require inspection before energization

ongoing_obligations.incident_reporting: Solar-related incidents must be reported per regulations 401-402
ongoing_obligations.record_keeping: Installation and testing records must be maintained

business_compliance.licensing: All electrical work must be performed by licensed workers
business_compliance.competency: Workers must be competent for the type of work

legal_status.parliamentary_tabling: Tabled in Parliament as required by law
legal_status.precedence: Takes precedence over industry codes where applicable

extraction_status.previous_data: FAKE - replaced with actual Victorian regulation content
extraction_status.legal_compliance_significance: CRITICAL - Primary legal framework for electrical safety in Victoria
